name: Salvation
description: God's plan to redeem humanity through faith in Jesus Christ

name: Faith
description: Trust and belief in God and His promises

name: Love
description: God's love for humanity and how we should love others

name: Prayer
description: Communication with God through worship, petition, and thanksgiving

name: Wisdom
description: Divine wisdom and understanding that comes from God

name: Forgiveness
description: God's forgiveness of sin and our call to forgive others

name: Holy Spirit
description: The third person of the Trinity who guides and empowers believers

name: Creation
description: God as the creator and sustainer of all things

name: Covenant
description: God's promises and agreements with His people throughout history

name: Prophecy
description: Divine revelation about future events and God's plan

name: Grace
description: Unmerited favor from God that brings salvation

name: Redemption
description: Being bought back from sin through Christ's sacrifice

name: Justification
description: Being declared righteous before God through faith

name: Sanctification
description: The process of becoming holy and set apart for God

name: Repentance
description: Turning away from sin and toward God

name: Obedience
description: Following God's commands out of love and reverence

name: Worship
description: Honoring and praising God in spirit and truth

name: Discipleship
description: Following and learning from Jesus as His student

name: Suffering
description: Trials and tribulations and their purpose in God's plan

name: Hope
description: Confident expectation in God's promises and future glory
